dcterms:description: The BDB dataset contains affinity information for 31K interactions of 924 compounds and 490 proteins from 81 protein families. It reports the protein-compound affinities in terms of pKd and has been used in previous protein-compound interaction prediction studies.
dcterms:title: BDB

dcterms:creator: Viet-Khoa Tran-Nguyen
Célien Jacquemard
Didier Rognan
dcterms:description: LIT-PCBA includes 15 target proteins and 7844 active and 407,381 inactive compounds. The dataset is specifically curated for virtual screening and machine learning with efforts made to ensure it is unbiased and realistic.
dcterms:title: LIT-PCBA

dcterms:creator: Heval Atas Guvenilir
Tunca Doğan
dcterms:description: ProtBENCH contains protein family-specific bioactivity datasets, including interactions belonging to different protein superfamilies. The family subsets have varying sizes in terms of interactions, number of proteins, and number of compounds.
dcterms:title: ProtBENCH
